oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in black ink with a lead pencil, 12 lines per page, sanded to avoid ink runs.
Covers missing, binding damaged. Ms. imperfect : several folios missing; paper in fragile condition, several pages frayed.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
